price: “Umarız ki sihirbazlar galip gelirlerse biz de onlara uyarız.”
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
